description.narrative: The project will help Tuvalu overcome connectivity constraints between the capital and outer islands, and promote economic and social development that is more inclusive and sustainable. It will improve maritime facilities in the three outer islands of Nukulaelae, Nanumaga, and Niutao as well as strengthen the government's capacity in operation and maintenance (O&M) and develop a transport sector master plan.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Maritime transfer operations in Nanumaga, Nui, Niutao, and Nukulaelae improved, anchored on a transport master plan, with a view to promoting fisheries and tourism

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

Transfer efficiency, defined as transferred volume of passengers and cargo divided by the dwell time in Nukulaelae and Niutao, improved by 20% (2013-2015 baseline: 1.59 cubic meters per hour on average for Nukulaelae)

description.narrative: Maritime transfer operations in Nanumaga, Nui, Niutao, and Nukulaelae improved, anchored on a transport master plan, with a view to promoting fisheries and tourism

title.narrative: Total number of passengers who have traveled to and from Nui, Nukulaelae and Niutao remain the same or increased (2015 baseline: 445 passengers for Nukulaelae) (2017 baseline: 1,175 passengers for Niutao) (2018 baseline: 625 passengers Nui)

description.narrative: Maritime transfer operations in Nanumaga, Nui, Niutao, and Nukulaelae improved, anchored on a transport master plan, with a view to promoting fisheries and tourism
